interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Calgon Massaging Beauty Bar - English Garden: 2 Bars
Review Date: 2015/04/17
Store: Calgon
Product Description: ["CALGON take me away! Wrap your skin in luxury with these unique beauty bars specifically formulated to cleanse, nourish and massage the skin with hydrating lotion. The creamy lather leaves skin soft, smooth and clean while the massage bumps help exfoliate and improve body's micro-circulation. Skin feels refreshed and moisturized all day long. Discover English Garden: A romantic bouquet of flowers that captures the essence of moonlit strolls in a lush, enchanted garden. 2 - 4.25 OZ ("]
Average Rating: 5.0
Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Calgon', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.8 x 2.8 x 3 inches; 8 Ounces', 'Item model number': '815890010103', 'UPC': '815890010103', 'Manufacturer': 'Calgon'}
Review Text: I love Calgon bath products...the scents are delicious and you feel like you've died & gone to heaven. The soaps are very creamy and leave you squeeky clean.
Review Title: Calgon ....!
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
Savon de Marseille, Jasmine fragrance, 5.3 Oz Bar soap, Marius Fabre
Marius Fabre
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Brand': 'Marius Fabre', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '5.3 Ounce', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3 x 1 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'HB150JA'}
The bar is rather small..but the jasmine is overly pungent! In a good way..I'm wondering could it be chemically enhanced? Most jasmine's are rather light in nature. Regardless this bar is for a special occasion like my birthday 2015
blooms in jasmine
Optimum Salon Haircare Damage Antidote Oil Moisturizer 8.5 oz
Soft-Sheen Carson
{'Material Type Free': 'Aluminum Free', 'Liquid Volume': '8.5 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Brand': 'Soft-Sheen Carson', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 2.5 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '755332133307 796433040804 075285008492 784190441354'}
I bought this product last year in 2014 at a local CVS pharmacy store. I like this product but I must warn African females (black) this product does leave a residue..so if you use this lotion daily..always brush your hair out. From the scalp to the ends...it reminds me of the "jerri curl" products from the 1980's. Over all my hair did not dry out and it stayed moisturized for atleast 2-3 before re-applying. If you use a pressing comb or hot curling iron dont mix this product with heat..if you desire a Donna Summers look this is perfect..
Better than a perm any day..
Venezia Soapworks Moisturizing Soap Rose - 7oz
Venezia
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Venezia', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.8 x 1.7 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '796433748755 895697010100 787461525142'}
This bar I purchased because I wanted to collect a rose scented bar from this company. When I'm in a mood for "florals" I scan amazon for certain scents of soaps. The reviews were reasonable regarding this brand. Only time will tell will I repeat my purchase.
A little piece of italy...I think?
Asquith & Somerset ROSE GARDEN 10.5 Oz Perfumed Bath Soap, Gift Wrapped, imported from England
Asquith & Somerset
{'Brand': 'Asquith & Somerset', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.8 x 3.7 x 1.4 inches; 8.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '784179663692'}
I have used Asquith & Somerset bath products since 2010. Top tier luxury soap makers along side Caswell & Massey. This bar was purchased as a gift for a relative.
Royalty...

profile:
**User Preferences Summary:**

- **Fragrance Preference:** The user continues to favor floral scents, particularly enjoying those that evoke romantic and enchanting experiences, such as the essence of moonlit strolls in lush gardens. Their preference for intense fragrances remains strong, highlighting a desire for memorable olfactory encounters.

- **Product Form:** The user maintains a commitment to bar soaps, reflecting a loyalty to traditional personal care. Their recent purchase emphasizes both a luxurious experience and practical benefits, showing appreciation for quality craftsmanship.

- **Context of Use:** The user seeks luxurious yet effective products suitable for both everyday indulgence and special occasions. They prioritize enhancing skin health while providing a rich sensory experience.

- **Brand Affinity:** The user demonstrates strong loyalty to reputable brands known for quality and effectiveness. They gravitate towards well-reviewed items from top-tier producers, showcasing a conscientious approach to personal care.

- **Product Evaluation:** The user consistently rates products highly, demonstrating a discerning taste for distinctive items. Their reviews underline a focus on quality and satisfaction, favoring products that align with their luxury standards.

- **Sensory Experience:** The user actively seeks products that offer rich sensory experiences, valuing aromas that leave lasting impressions. Their interest in creamy textures and effective cleansing emphasizes their pursuit of enjoyment in personal care routines.

Overall, this user appreciates high-quality, luxurious personal care products in traditional forms, particularly with floral fragrances, while remaining dedicated to effective and distinctive options for everyday and special occasions.
